trans-unit.source: Represents a set of methods for creating instances of the OLEDB provider's implementation of the data source classes.
Returns a strongly-typed <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> instance.
A new strongly-typed instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> enumeration.

Gets an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbFactory" />.
This can be used to retrieve strongly-typed data objects.

The following code fragment uses the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbFactory.Instance> field to retrieve an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbFactory> instance, and then return a strongly-typed <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> instance:
trans-unit.target: Il frammento di codice seguente utilizza il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbFactory.Instance> campo da recuperare un <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbFactory> istanza e quindi restituire l'oggetto fortemente tipizzato <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> istanza:
